title: Repo sync

details: Added `mdast-util-gfm` and `micromark-extension-gfm` for GitHub Flavored Markdown support.
Replaced HTML scraping with Article API-based search indexing using markdown AST parsing.

Added tests for new API-based indexing; removed old scraping modules.

raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added `mdast-util-gfm` and `micromark-extension-gfm` for GitHub Flavored Markdown support.
- Replaced HTML scraping with Article API-based search indexing using markdown AST parsing.
- Moved `typescript` from devDependencies to dependencies for runtime use.
- Updated `package-lock.json` with peer flags and dependency adjustments.
- Added tests for new API-based indexing; removed old scraping modules.

### Title
Add Article API-based search indexing with GFM support
